summary: This script creates a new shell script from 'make*' files, adds the shebang (#!/bin/bash) at the beginning, and makes it executable.

details.comment: This script creates a new shell script from 'make*' files, adds the shebang (#!/bin/bash) at the beginning, and makes it executable.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
ls  -1 make* | awk '{print"python3 "$0}' > newShit.sh
# this IS not GNU sed.
sed -i '1i #!/bin/bash' newShit.sh
chmod +x newShit.sh
